Name: Velvet Maker
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare pink grapefruit zest for garnish.
Express pink grapefruit zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Originally made with home infused vanilla vodka, zesty grapefruit, and dry vermouth which adds balancing botanical complexity.
History: Created by yours truly and named after Velvet Maker , the filly who won the 15:05 at the wonderfully named Fairyhouse racecourse in Ireland on 31st January 2015 - the day I first made this drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Velvet Maker contains 190 calories
